movie.title: Eve
movie.description_intro: When a talented actress fails to land the role of her dreams, she becomes obsessed with the up-and-comer who gets the part.
movie.description_full: When a talented actress fails to land the role of her dreams, she becomes obsessed with the up-and-comer who gets the part.

movies.title: A Civil Action
movies.summary: Jan Schlichtmann, a tenacious lawyer, is addressed by a group of families. When investigating the seemingly non-profiting case, he finds it to be a major environmental issue that has a lot of impact potential. A leather production company could be responsible for several deadly cases of leukemia, but also is the main employer for the area. Schlichtmann and his three colleagues set out to have the company forced to decontaminate the affected areas, and of course to sue for a major sum of compensation. But the lawyers of the leather company's mother company are not easy to get to, and soon Schlichtmann and his friends find themselves in a battle of mere survival.

movies.title: Clownface
movies.summary: A deranged serial killer known as "Clownface" terrorises the residents of a small town.
movies.description_full: A deranged serial killer known as "Clownface" terrorises the residents of a small town.

movies.title: Walker
movies.summary: William Walker and his mercenary corps enter Nicaragua in the middle of the 19th century in order to install a new government by a coup d'etat. All is being financed by an American multimillionaire who has his own interest in this country.
